verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> without <S%G379>excuse<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, whosoever thou <S%G3956>art<s%> that <S%G2919>judgest<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> wherein1722, 3739 thou <S%G2919>judges<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%>, thou <S%G2632>condemnest<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>thou<s%> that <S%G2919>judgest<s%> dost practise the same <S%G4238>things<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> them that <S%G4238>practise<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3049>reckonest<s%> thou <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, who <S%G2919>judgest<s%> them that <S%G4238>practise<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>doest<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> shalt <S%G1628>escape<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?

Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G2706>despisest<s%> thou the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5544>goodness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G463>forbearance<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%>, not <S%G50>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G5543>goodness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G71>leadeth<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%>?

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4643>hardness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G279>impenitent<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> treasurest <S%G2343>up<s%> for <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the righteous <S%G1341>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;
who <S%G3739><s%> will <S%G591>render<s%> to every <S%G1538>man<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>:

to <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G18>in<s%> <S%G2041>well-doing<s%> seek <S%G2212>for<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G861>incorruption<s%>, <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> unto <S%G3588>them<s%> that are <S%G2052>factious<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G544>obey<s%> not the <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3982>obey<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>, shall be <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2372>indignation<s%>,

tribulation <S%G2347><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4730>anguish<s%>, <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> that <S%G2716>worketh<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>, of the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G1672>Greek<s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2532>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> to every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G2038>worketh<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>, to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greek<s%>:
for <S%G1063><s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> respect of <S%G4382>persons<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> without <S%G460>law<s%> <S%G622>shall<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%> without the <S%G460>law<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1722>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>;

for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G202>hearers<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> are <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G4163>doers<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall be <S%G1344>justified<s%>:

(for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> that <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> by <S%G5449>nature<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G3778>these<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> unto <S%G1438>themselves<s%>;

in <S%G3748>that<s%> they <S%G1731>show<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1123>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> bearing <S%G4828>witness<s%> <S%G2532>therewith<s%>, and their <S%G3053>thoughts<s%> <S%G3342>one<s%> with <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G2723>accusing<s%> or else2228, 2532 excusing <S%G626>them<s%>);

in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2927>secrets<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

But <S%G1492><s%> if <S%G4771>thou<s%> bearest the <S%G2028>name<s%> of a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1879>restest<s%> upon the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2744>gloriest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1097>knowest<s%> his <S%G2307>will<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1381>approvest<s%> the things that are <S%G1308>excellent<s%>, being <S%G2727>instructed<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>,

and <S%G5037><s%> art confident <S%G3982>that<s%> thou <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G1511>art<s%> a <S%G3595>guide<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind<s%>, a <S%G5457>light<s%> of <S%G3588>them<s%> that are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%>,

a <S%G3810>corrector<s%> of the <S%G878>foolish<s%>, a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of <S%G3516>babes<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> the <S%G3446>form<s%> of <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>;

thou <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> that <S%G1321>teachest<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%>, teachest <S%G1321>thou<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>? thou that <S%G2784>preachest<s%> a man should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2813>steal<s%>, dost thou <S%G2813>steal<s%>?

thou that <S%G3004>sayest<s%> a man should <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>, dost thou commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>? thou that <S%G948>abhorrest<s%> <S%G1497>idols<s%>, dost thou rob <S%G2416>temples<s%>?

thou <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2744>gloriest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> thy <S%G3847>transgression<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> dishonorest <S%G818>thou<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G5209>you<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G5623>profiteth<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> thou be a <S%G4238>doer<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> thou <S%G1510>be<s%> a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> the <S%G1345>ordinances<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, shall <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> be <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>?

and <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G2919>not<s%> the <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> which is <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G5449>nature<s%>, if it <S%G5055>fulfil<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> the <S%G1121>letter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> art a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%> who is one3588, 1722 <S%G5318>outwardly<s%>; <S%G3761>neither<s%> is that <S%G1722>circumcision<s%> which is <S%G5318>outward<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> is a <S%G2453>Jew<s%> who is one3588, 1722 <S%G2927>inwardly<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is that of the <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in the <S%G1121>letter<s%>; <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.
